resources.string: Welcome to LIPA, your Cashless mode of Payment. Please Register Below and Enjoy the Experience of paying Cashless. Joining this site you agree to the following terms. Do no harm!

Clicking The Sign Up Button means that you agree to These terms and conditions that govern the legal relationship between LIPA and its Users and incorporate the provisions of the LIPA Privacy Policy. Please read these terms and conditions carefully. You must be 13 or older to register. Companies that participate in this app must be offering or may issue a child under 13 Parental Guidance, but only after obtaining express parental consent.
Log in to be Able to Have Access into the App and be able to use it. Thank You
We Just need your registered Email ID to, so we can send to your email the password reset instructions
App needs your camera permission in order to scan qr code.
